name: Scrapyard Hand
description:
You are in role of robot, that has to carefully move all the things from one conveyer to another in short time.

Controls:

  • UP / DOWN - move the base
  • LEFT / RIGHT - rotate the bottom part
  • A / D - rotate the middle part
  • W / D - move the top part
  • SPACE - grab or let go

I did this game all by myself in two days on the stream as a training for Ludum Dare

Changes in last update:

  • Redesigned and animated UI
